message.body: Happy bday love! Im sorry I didnt make it out last nite- I talked to Ant then cried my face off and passed out... So lame. Can u do dinner this week w me?
Hey honey, my battery died and I didn't get out of bed yesterday. I'm sorry shit went down with ant. I missed you Saturday, but I understand. Lets try for this week xoxo
Yea im sorry. I had a complete breakdown this weekend. I justt cried for days... Hows Thurs for u?
Oh jeeze..did something happen? How are you now? Thursday is good after my riding lesson, any time after 6
Im just stressed and Ant changed his # wo telling me
Oh man
Yea I gotta keep it together
It's tough, you've got a lot going on
Oh my, I just came back from Lancaster, there are some handsome boys with beards there
We need them I haaaaaate all the men here.
Ive also been notcing how its hardish to compete w young girls
But tbey suck. Dudes r IDIOTS
Ugh, young girls are the worst, it's like our past coming back to haunt us
Well matts staring at our super young bartender and Ants dating a 24 yr old
Hate.
What dating Matt? Or just dudes in gen?
Both.
You gotta join the over thirty club, it's still annoying, but it's better
Ill try. Why arent dudes just seeking me out tho
Because Philly is kinda dumb. You need to figure out what kind of guy you want. You know bike messengers are bad newz
I know.im just lonely
I know, I feel you. That's how I hung out with Steve for so long, ha. At some point you have to get a little lonely to clear your head. As long as you are having fun, no worries
Im not tho. Not really
Then cut it off..once you aren't having fun, then it isn't helping you. If its taking your mind off of serious things then that's great, but if its just making you feel worse..
